Address.Address1: Paddy Harte Road, Letterkenny, Co Donegal

Description.Text: Welcoming guests with warm Irish hospitality, the Radisson Blu Hotel provides guests with the perfect base for exploring the spectacular countryside and coast of North West Ireland. Outdoor adventure awaits in Glenveagh National Park and along the rugged shoreline of the remote Inishowen Peninsula. Boasting 114 well furnished guest rooms, this hotel offers an ideal retreat after a full day and an an on-site fitness centre with pool, sauna and spa. (GW 11/2012)

Tucked away in the heart of County Donegal's largest city. Guests can easily walk to Letterkenny's best shopping and business destinations, and charming heritage and cultural sites are also nearby. Guests who wish to explore North West Ireland's rugged countryside find that this hotel serves as an ideal base for day trips. Easily accessible by major highways, Letterkenny also offers regular bus service to Belfast, Sligo, Galway and Dublin.

Well furnished with one king-sized bed or twin-sized beds, the Standard Rooms also feature a comfortable work desk and bathroom with both shower and bathtub. Four-star amenities in these well-appointed rooms include Free high-speed, wireless Internet access, coffee and tea provisions and mini bar. Guests appreciate complimentary access to the renowned Super Breakfast Buffet, which features a variety of fresh fruits, yoghurts, cereals and fresh-baked breads and pastries.
The exterior is modern with large areas of glass.

From award-winning seafood at Brasserie Tribeca to traditional pub fare at Oakk Bar & Grill, guests at the Radisson Blu Hotel can sample the best of Letterkenny restaurants. Relaxing Palm Lounge also offers an extensive menu of tasty snacks and beverages. For guests who prefer to dine in the privacy of their room, the hotel offers 24-hour room service.
The lobby is bright and spacious with seating areas throughout.
